title: Dune, by Frank Herbert
description: Dune is set in the distant future amidst a feudal interstellar society in which various noble houses control planetary fiefs.

title: The Road, by Cormac McCarthy
description: The book details the grueling journey of a father and his young son over a period of several months across a landscape blasted by an unspecified cataclysm that has destroyed industrial civilization and almost all life

title: Eragon, by Christopher Paolini
description: When fifteen-year-old Eragon finds a polished blue stone in the forest, he thinks it is the lucky discovery of a poor farm boy. He  soon realizes he has stumbled upon a legacy nearly as old as the Empire itself

title: The Chronic
description: The Chronic is the debut studio album by the American hip hop producer and rapper Dr. Dre. It was released on December 15, 1992, by his record label Death Row Records

title: Bad
description: Bad is the seventh studio album by the American singer and songwriter Michael Jackson. It was released on August 31, 1987, by Epic Records,

title: Sensational
description: Sensational is the debut studio album from Minnesota native rap artist Yung Gravy. The album features collaborative efforts with Gravy's frequent collaborators MIA GLADSTONE and bbno$

title: Baguette
description: A baguette is a long, thin type of bread of French origin that is commonly made from basic lean dough.

title: Pumpernickel
description: Pumpernickel is a typically dense, slightly sweet rye bread traditionally made with sourdough starter and coarsely ground rye.

title: Naan
description: A typical naan recipe involves mixing white or whole wheat flour with active dry yeast, salt, and water. The dough is kneaded for a few minutes, then set aside to rise for a few hours

title: Milwaukee Drill
description: Compact 1/2 Inch Hammer Drill/Driver is the most compact in its class. This drill delivers 500 in-lbs of torque and up to 1,800 RPM

title: Garden Hoe
description: 6.25-In forged blade breaks up hard compacted soil. Features a beveled blade edge for a cleaner cut. 4ft tall.

title: Paint Brush
description: 3 inch Ship brush. Wood handle, horse hair bristles, stainless steal  crimp.
